title: Olympia Visibility Brigade
description: Join us weekly to make good trouble. We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area and also during evening rush hour on Mondays. We support Capitol protests when possible. Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes, and a good mood. Introverts welcome!
raw_text:
Impatient for the next big protest? Us too! Join us weekly to make good trouble!
OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE
We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area
We also deploy on Mondays during evening rush hour
We support Capitol protests when possible
Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes, a good mood, and be tolerant of terrible dancing. Introverts welcome!
Upcoming Event: Monday, July 21st @ 4:30 - 6:30 pm
College St SE over I-5, Lacey
Park behind Burger King
Look for upcoming Olympia Visibility Brigade events at theblop.org and backbonecampaign.org
raw_summary: The image is a promotional flyer for the Olympia Visibility Brigade, inviting people to join weekly protests and events, particularly focusing on an upcoming event on Monday, July 21st in Lacey.

title: Public School Support Drive + Protest
description: We are organizing a donation drive and sign-waving event to support both North Thurston and Olympia schools. Feel free to bring signs focusing on any issue troubling you. All are welcome.
raw_text: PUBLIC SCHOOL SUPPORT DRIVE + PROTEST 21 JULY 5:30 - 7:00 P.M. TIVOLI FOUNTAIN, CAPITOL CAMPUS DONATION DRIVE + SIGN-WAVING EVENT! Feel free to bring signs focusing on ANY issue troubling you. ALL ARE WELCOME. Needed for Teachers: Kleenex Dry Erase Markers Wet wipes Needed for Students: Markers Composition notebooks Crayons Donations to benefit both North Thurston and Olympia schools with a high percentage of unhoused or minority families. EVERGREEN RESISTANCE evergreenresistance.org MOBILIZE MONDAYS!
raw_summary: The image is promoting a public event called "Public School Support Drive + Protest" happening on July 21, from 5:30 PM to 7:00 PM at Tivoli Fountain, Capitol Campus. It is a donation drive and sign-waving event, inviting participants to bring signs addressing any issues. Donations are requested for teachers and students and will benefit North Thurston and Olympia schools.

title: Ride for Our Republic
description: A cycling event to raise awareness against tyranny and promote democracy, occurring on the last Saturday of each month. Participants ride through specified locations starting from Paul Revere Park and ending at Minuteman Bikeway, totaling 12.7 miles.
address: Paul Revere Park at N Washington St, Boston
raw_text:
RIDE FOR OUR REPUBLIC
We cycle together to sound the alarm of tyranny and fight for our democracy.
A Recurring #Ride4Republic on the last Saturday of the month
Next Rides Sat. July 26th and Aug. 30th
Starting Location: Paul Revere Park at N Washington St, Boston
Waypoint(s): Davis Square in Somerville at 10:45am
Uncle Sam Park Arlington Center at 11:30am
End Location: Minuteman Bikeway, Lexington Center, 12:30pm
1st part 3.9 miles + 2nd part 3.8 miles + 3rd part 5 miles =12.7 miles
Follow the Ride for Our Republic Facebook Page
raw_summary: The flyer promotes "Ride for Our Republic," a recurring cycling event to raise awareness against tyranny and promote democracy. The next rides are scheduled for July 26th and August 30th. The event begins at Paul Revere Park in Boston with two waypoints and ends at Minuteman Bikeway in Lexington. Participants are encouraged to follow the event's Facebook page.

title: North County Unity Rally & Day of Action
description: Join us for the North County Unity Rally & Day of Action to advocate for progress and unity. A message and movement for equality and voting rights, featuring speakers from North County's progressive coalitions, local candidates, and elected officials. Organized by the Democratic Club of Carlsbad Oceanside.
address: Corner of N. Coast Hwy & Pier View Way
raw_text:
JOIN US IN PLACE OF OUR MONTHLY MEETING
Powerful Morning of Action
EQUAL RIGHTS FOR ALL
NO HUMAN BEING IS ILLEGAL
Saturday
NORTH COUNTY UNITY RALLY & DAY OF ACTION
OCEANSIDE CIVIC CENTER
(CORNER OF N. COAST HWY & PIER VIEW WAY)
JULY 26, 2025 | 10 AM-NOON
DEMOCCO
Democratic Club of Carlsbad Oceanside
THIS IS A RALLY, A MOVEMENT, AND A MESSAGE. LET'S MAKE IT LOUD AND CLEAR: NORTH COUNTY IS UNITED—AND WE VOTE.
SPEAKERS FROM ACROSS NORTH COUNTY'S PROGRESSIVE COALITIONS, LOCAL CANDIDATES & ELECTED OFFICIALS
SCAN ME!
WANT TO HELP POWER FUTURE PROTESTS AND RALLIES?
raw_summary: The image describes a public event, "North County Unity Rally & Day of Action," scheduled for July 26, 2025, from 10 AM to Noon at the Oceanside Civic Center. It aims to replace the usual monthly meeting with a rally for unity and action, organized by DEMCCO, the Democratic Club of Carlsbad Oceanside.
